metadata.feature_description: Basic UI structure and navigation for URL management module

steps.action: Navigated to localhost:8081 and logged in as host user
steps.expected: Login successful and Persona Bar accessible
steps.actual: Login successful, Persona Bar displayed with Settings menu visible

steps.action: Clicked Settings icon in Persona Bar to access SEO panel
steps.expected: URL Management module loads in the SEO section
steps.actual: SEO panel opened with URL Management tab selected by default, showing GENERAL SETTINGS sub-tab with URL REWRITER and URL REDIRECTS sections

steps.action: Observed the GENERAL SETTINGS tab content after module load
steps.expected: Module initializes with proper settings displayed
steps.actual: Module fully initialized with URL REWRITER section (Standard Replacement Character, Concatenate Page URLs, Convert URLs to Lowercase, Convert Accented Characters, Set Default Site Language) and URL REDIRECTS section (Redirect deleted/expired/disabled pages, Redirect to Friendly URLs, Redirect Mixed Case URLs) all properly displayed with their current values

steps.action: Clicked on EXTENSION URL PROVIDERS sub-tab
steps.expected: Tab switches and displays extension URL providers content
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully, displayed table with NAME and ENABLED columns showing two providers: Evoq Content Item Url Extension Provider and Evoq Structured Content Visualizer Url Extension Provider (both enabled)

steps.expected: Tab switches and displays regular expressions content
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully, displayed REGULAR EXPRESSIONS section with multiple configurable expressions: Ignore URL, Do Not Rewrite URL, Site URLs Only, Do Not Redirect URL, Do Not Redirect Https URL, Prevent Lowercase URL, Do Not Use Friendly URLs, Keep in Querystring, URLs With No Extension, Valid Friendly URL

steps.expected: Tab switches and displays URL testing interface
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully, displayed two sections: TEST A PAGE URL (with Page to Test dropdown, Add Query String field, Custom Page Name field, Test URL button, Resulting URLs output) and TEST URL REWRITING (with URL to Test field, Test URL Rewriting button, and result fields for Rewriting Result, Identified Language/Culture, Identified Page, Redirection Result, Redirection Reason, Operation Messages)

steps.action: Clicked on Sitemap Settings main tab
steps.expected: Main tab switches and displays sitemap settings content
steps.actual: Main tab switched successfully, displayed GENERAL SITEMAP SETTINGS section (Sitemap URL, Exclude URLs With Priority Lower Than, Include Hidden Pages, Days to Cache Sitemap For, Minimum Priority for Pages, Use Page Level Based Priorities), SITEMAP PROVIDERS table, and SITE SUBMISSION section with search engine submission options

observations: The referenced code files (urlmanagement.js and urlmanagement.html) contain only placeholder/stub code with 'Hello World' text and basic alert functions, but the actual URL Management module in the UI is fully functional with comprehensive features
The actual implementation appears to be part of the core Evoq PersonaBar framework rather than the specific files referenced in the test instructions
The UI is responsive and all tab navigation works smoothly without any errors or delays
Cancel and Save buttons are properly disabled when no changes have been made to settings
